name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Private Pilot Ground School
base_name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Private Pilot Ground School
long_desc: This course aims to provide information for students to prepare for the FAA Private Pilot Knowledge Test and engineering behind aviation. Topics include aerodynamics, aircraft systems, navigation, meteorology, aircraft performance, and human factors. No prior knowledge is required.

custom_fields.goals: Passing the FAA Pilot written exam for those who wanted, and gain a better understanding of aviation for those who do not want to take the exam.
custom_fields.key_topics: The aviation knowledge that is related to the FAA Private Pilot Exam.
custom_fields.relevance: This course is fundamental for students who want to pursue an aviation career, as it prepares them for the FAA examination. The course also serves as a solid introduction course for those who are unfamiliar with aviation and who want to learn more about "aviation-behind-the-scene."
custom_fields.learning_resources: FAA web pages and textbooks, as well as lecture slides.
